code: @Override public boolean isUseDebugger() {     // must enable debugger     return true. }
@Override protected void debugBefore(Exchange exchange, Processor processor, ProcessorDefinition<?> definition, String id, String label) {     before.add(id). }

@Test public void testDebugBefore() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied().     assertEquals(2, before.size()).     assertEquals("log1", before.get(0)).     assertEquals("to1", before.get(1)). }
